title: hiatus

summary:
The Session has been online for over 20 years.  When you maintain a site for that long, you don’t want to be relying on third parties—it’s only a matter of time until they’re no longer around. 

Some third party APIs are unavoidable...
title: Progressively enhancing maps

summary: Presently sponsored by: 1Password Extended Access Management: Secure every sign-in for every app on every device. I'm back in Oslo.  Writing this the day after recording, it feels like I couldn't be further from Dubai; the temperature starts with a minus, it's snowing and there's not a supercar in sight...

feedTitle: F-Droid - Free and Open Source Android App Repository
summary:
Dear members of the F-Droid community,

Due to an error on the part of the Board of Directors, the call for
nominations to the F-Droid Community
Council
was not properly communicated on our Mastodon
profile and
forum.   For this reason, we are extending the
deadline for nominations from the 15th of December 2024 to the 29th of
December 2024.   These nominations will be announced shortly before the New
Year...
title: More time to submit Community Council nominations
